post.body: Got any promo codes for WorshipMedia?
That is WAY better than a countdown! It will distinquish me as the leader at #NYETB! I Liked the countdown in the TOP Left!THX
thanks Shawn these are great better than any thing i have found! we have an extensive teen blast budget don't worry about it!
yeah for sure! Schedule-Matte Lewis- VJ Skit (How long is it?)-Shawn Michael Shoup-Dirk Helmling-Remedy Drive
i guess a countdown that includes the ball drop in the background w/ a 2009 lite up at the end! is that too much to ask?! LOL!
to countdown to midnight
i was thinking a countdown from 10 and it would be awesome if there was an end with happy new year something we could play
tweets is there a service or website I can use to upload pdf's to a blogger website? Shoot me a link if you know of something! Thanks!
HEY VIDEO GURU MAN OF THE YEAR! (have i brown-nosed sufficiently) is there anyway you could make me a countdown for NYETB?!
where did you get them? What do you mean by win?
i was rootin for Griffin so much for that! I thought #57701 might get them in the vicinity! Dang single zip code hicks!
:re starbucks! Classic!
headed to lunch with my beautiful wife sounds like TJ's super nacho's and intestinal jihad are on tap!
RT @shawnmichael: looking at New Year's Eve countdown vids on WorshipHouseMedia... anybody find one they are really excited about?
we use SongShowPlus give me a list and i'll put it together!
publishing a promo video for Teen Blast! Then uploading it to web 2.0 sites!
finishing up wednesday stuff and wondering when @foecustudents will start subscribing to the blog/newsletter!
foecustudents blog The Best EVER Oh You Are Too Kind!: New Year's Eve Teen Blast 2009 Well let.. http://tinyurl.com/68jae6
OK I am convinced! @CloverNews' New Video Feature is AWESOME! Can't wait till we start using video! http://bellefourchechurch.com CHECK IT!
#NYETB Blogged! New Video (and first uploading to http://bellefourchechurch.com)! Now headed home for a date night w/ my wife @ Olive Garden
have i ever told you how much i strongly dislike IE 7 it crashes atleast daily and usually when i am in the middle of a Teen Blast Email!
Getting ready to head to a BCAP board meeting for Drug and Alcohol Prevention in Butte County
Made a new slide show to roll between and before the services @ christian life center and wishing @CloverSites had the picture Roller up!
Drinking a Triple Espresso w/ foam while printing #NYETB Staff Lanyards and Door Signs! And waiting to go to get #NYETB Sponsor Check!
http://twitpic.com/xx7r - As did next 1/4's reading book 4 @clcboard (It) and the one they will read after
http://twitpic.com/xx6d - Jesusmas presents for @foecustudents came last nite! Bible answer book 4 students
baby is all ready to go! time to go to work! Lunch date today to receive a check for #NYETB my ugly mugg will be in next wednesdays paper!
Getting slide shows with sponsors and rules all finalized for #NYETB!
Good morning of productivity so far now to fold some braden close feed him shower and then head to the office for a day full of #NYETB Prep!
Cleaning up around the house with my wife! Before the first in what i hope to be a new tradition! Family QT!
Headed to #57701 to hit Someones in the Kitchen to use our gift card (Hello new French PRESS!) Then back to the inlaws for #UFC 92!
Its all taken care of all thats left is replace the kitchen drain, that disintegrated (old) when I took it appart, back together with new!
Drain Issues going to spearfish to rent the big dog 100ft. drain snake! The washer backed up and put water all over the basement last night!
JESUSmas bookroll: Exiles, Missional Leader, Crazy Love, Jesus Centered YM, Revisiting Relational YM, and Hurt:Inside todays teens world
I am off to my Grandparent in-laws for Oyster Stew and the Card Game 500 (Don't worry we throw out the face cards which makes it leas evil!
getting my last cup of Pony Java before JESUSmas! then to get lunch for me and my @beautifulwifethatrefusesto usesocialnetworkingofanykind!
I am going to make a events page listing our Christmas Eve Candlelight Service on http://bellefourchechurch.com for people googling it!
Home for supper with a couple of my youth leaders and my family! Just created an ad on facebook for NYETB tell me if you see it!
POLL: Is it more important for everyone in church to be on mission or to be together in a small group? NO "They are the same" answers!
not to brag or anything but I am drinking another amazing americano brought to me by my amazing employees at the Pony Express-O
